Title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
Writer: Vijayendra Prasad (story), Kabir Khan (screenplay), Parveez Sheikh (screenplay), Vijayendra Prasad (screenplay), Kabir Khan (dialogue)
Actors: Salman Khan, Harshaali Malhotra, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Kareena Kapoor
Plot: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.
